com.android.launcher

Class DragLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.android.launcher.DragLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, DragController

    public class DragLayer
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements DragController
    A ViewGroup that coordinated dragging across its dscendants

    • Method Detail

      • startDrag

        public void startDrag(android.view.View v,
             DragSource source,
             java.lang.Object dragInfo,
             int dragAction)
        Description copied from interface: DragController
        Starts a drag
        Specified by:
        startDrag in interface DragController
        Parameters:
        v - The view that is being dragged
        source - An object representing where the drag originated
        dragInfo - The data associated with the object that is being dragged
        dragAction - The drag action: either DragController.DRAG_ACTION_MOVE or DragController.DRAG_ACTION_COPY
